name: Blossom
description: The tactician and self-proclaimed leader of the Powerpuff Girls. Her personality ingredient is "everything nice", her signature color is pink, and she has long red hair with a red bow.

name: Bubbles
description: The cute and sensitive one. Her personality ingredient is sugar, her signature color is blue, and she has short blonde hair in two pigtails.

name: Buttercup
description: The toughest of the three. Her personality ingredient is spice, her signature color is green, and she has short black hair in a flip.
